Identification. This species is characterized by the leaf blade without conspicuous venation and not variegated; petiolar sheaths are long with scarious sheath margins. The spathe of the inflorescence is persistent until late fruiting ( Nicolson 1969 ).
Distribution and ecology. Widespread in Sabah . Lowland to upper hill evergreen gallery forest, peat-swamp forest.
